locations.name: Shanghai
locations.description: Dazzling metropolis where futuristic skyscrapers meet colonial charm, featuring the Bund and vibrant art districts.

locations.name: Lijiang
locations.description: Charming, UNESCO-listed town known for its ancient Naxi culture, cobbled streets, and canals in Yunnan province.

locations.name: Shangri-La
locations.description: A place of dramatic Himalayan foothills, Tibetan monasteries, and profound tranquility, offering scenic hikes.

locations.name: Guilin
locations.description: Famed for its otherworldly karst landscape, the Li River region, and serving as a base for exploring nearby villages and potentially the Longji Rice Terraces.

locations.name: Hong Kong
locations.description: Captivating finale where East meets West, offering panoramic views from Victoria Peak, bustling markets, and world-class cuisine.
